Package com.fujitsu.xml.xbase.resolver

This package provide classes to resolving relative URI by the definition of XML Base specification.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
XMLBaseResolver Class that provides an XBase resolver.
 

Exception Summary
XBaseException XBase resolver exception class.
 

Package com.fujitsu.xml.xbase.resolver Description

This package provide classes to resolving relative URI by the definition of XML Base specification.
